title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 
31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) (Amendment) (No.2) 
Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 15th day of June
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 2) (amendment) (no.2) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall come operation 15th day june

title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: 2. Regulation 7(3) of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 7(3) of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 206 of 2020) is 
amended by the substitution of the following subparagraph for subparagraph 
(c): 

“(c) 

the use of a premises, or part of a premises, for the purposes of - 

(i) 

(ii) 

a meeting of a local authority (within the meaning 
of the Act of 2001), 

a sitting of one or both Houses of the Oireachtas or 
a committee thereof (within the meaning of section 
2 of the Houses of the Oireachtas (Inquiries, 
Privileges and Procedures) Act 2013 (No. 33 of 
2013)), or 

(iii) a meeting of a political party registered in the 
Register of Political Parties (within the meaning of 
Part III of the Electoral Act 1992 (No. 23 of 1992)) 
or a meeting of a parliamentary party of such 
political party.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [212] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Health, 

15 June, 2020. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [212]

title: and other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the provisions of Regulation 7(3) of the Health Act 
1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 2) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 206 of 2020), as amended, to allow the use of premises in 
Schedule 2 of the Regulations for meetings of registered political parties 
(including parliamentary parties of those parties).
